entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of drizzle or rain. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon then 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
